response:
The total number of potted plants Mary starts with is

\[
18\ (\text{new}) + 2 \times 40\ (\text{on the ledges}) = 18 + 80 = 98.
\]

She gives away 1 plant from each of the 40 ledges, so she gives away

\[
1 \times 40 = 40
\]

plants.

The number of plants she keeps is

\[
98 - 40 = 58.
\]

#### 4 58
